document_data.mainbody:
he Heartseeker dagger was a unique enchanted sentient dagger, found in the 15 century DR.
Apart from possessing a +2 enchantment, the weapons will directed the wielders hand towards vulnerable spots on its target.
In the late 15 century DR, the Heartseeker dagger changed hands several times among heroes and villains of the Sword Mountains, the city of Neverwinter, and the Old Owl Well. It also was in possession of Kajin the pirate who laired in the Sword Mountains.
